items.title: Support for additional languages
items.subtitle:
This version adds translations for Georgian, Ingush, Chechen and Uzbek languages.
Credits: @marginani, Zara ت, 𝔄𝔪𝔦𝔰𝔥𝔨𝔞, زالينة بلييفا, @m5164841

items.title: New "bedtime" adhkar category
items.subtitle: Part of evening adhkar was split into a new category.
